name: Mallice - Prototype
description:
Malicious Demon, a creature proposed by Socrates that can present us a complete illusion of an eternal world, even altering logic . This game shows how this demon can do to a person that suffers from Schizophrenia by presenting a bizarre night he experience.

This is an assignment of mine and also a  prototype for me to make it into a real game if I have the chance.

Gameplay :
